message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's only fair to present this opportunity at a price reflecting its true value. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing our product for $950000.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $750000 for your product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your position and would like to present an alternative. Considering the value of the product and our costs, we are willing to negotiate further. We propose a price of $875000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $800000 for your product.
